## Basic
### *ply
>  ddply(.data, .variables, .fun = NULL, ..., .progress = "none", .inform = FALSE, .drop = TRUE, .parallel = FALSE, .paropts = NULL)

|       | array | list  | table |   |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| array | aaply | alply | adply | a_ply |
| list  | laply | llply | ldply | l_ply |
| table | daply | dlply | ddply | d_ply |
|       | maply | mlply | mdply | m_ply |

> ddply ---> dplyr

```{r}
ddply(df, .(cyl, vs), each(nrow, ncol, max))
```
